history.content:
CivHacks is a 48-hour ASUC-hosted hackathon open to all college students on the weekend of 4/23-4/25!!

Our hackathon aspires to provide a welcoming, engaging, and creative environment to support social good in tech culture. As a result, all experience levels are welcome to register.

Participants will be using tech to tackle issues in civics, student success, health, and sustainability.

Amazon Web Services (AWS) will be actively recruiting! Students will gain access to recruiting and learning opportunities, as well as create their own social impact on the world with their projects! There are over $5000 in prizes!

Volunteers from:

AWS

Google

Cockroach Labs

EchoAR

Kaiser Permanente

CITRIS and the Banatao Institute

Goldman School of Public Policy

and more...

Register here (deadline: 4/16):

https://www.tinyurl.com/civhacksregistration

Our website:

https://www.civhacks.com/

To see our schedule, speakers, workshops, etc. please visit our notion:

https://www.tinyurl.com/civhacksnotion

Follow this Facebook Event for more updates:

https://www.facebook.com/events/2834683530182498

Follow our Instagram @civhacks
history.subject: [Learning/Recruiting Opportunity] CivHacks, hosted by the ASUC
